show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

title: Government Spending: The Endgame
content:
Again, it is necessary to rehearse the horrors of the out-of-control spending that the government indulges in. <!--more--> The spending, complete with the lies that go with it, fools most people because they have no alternative means of accessing the truth.
GDP for the first quarter collapsed.
  Pennsylvania police no longer need a warrant to search a citizen’s vehicle.
A comment on last Friday’s unemployment report.
Update on the TPP.
A full discussion of the woeful inadequacy of the consumer price index (CPI) as a measure of economic activity.
The cost of federal regulations is now bigger than the entire economies of all but nine countries in the world.
House flipping is back!
Oh, joy!
